meanings.definition: A type of undergarment worn by women.
meanings.sent1: She bought a new panty at the store.
meanings.sent2: Her panty was pink and lacy.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally wore her panty inside out today.
meanings.sent4: Her panty was a shield of comfort during the long day.
meanings.sent5: The silky panty felt smooth against her skin.

meanings.definition: A single piece of this undergarment.
meanings.sent1: She found a stray panty in the laundry basket.
meanings.sent2: The panty was too small for her to wear comfortably.
meanings.sent3: The lost panty turned up in the most unexpected place.
meanings.sent4: The panty lay forgotten on the bedroom floor.
meanings.sent5: A lone panty hung on the clothesline, swaying in the breeze.
